description:
Atari 2600 VCS emulator based on Stella 3.5-svn. Tested running 60fps on the Pre. Install the "Remove Tap Locator" patch from Preware to improve performance when using touch controls. NOTE: The user must supply their own game ROMs and transfer them to the device's internal storage for use with this app.

Features include:
* Save state support, auto-save and ten manual slots for save states. (NOTE: write access to /media/internal is required, some versions of WebOS 1.4.5 are broken and need to be re-installed via WebOS Doctor)
* Supports ROMs in .a26 and .bin formats, optionally in ZIP files
* Configurable on-screen multi-touch controls in addition to keyboard controls
* iCade support (WebOS 2.0 or later)
* Portrait/Landscape orientation support

Follow me on Twitter for updates about my apps:
https://twitter.com/rakashazi

Visit the homepage at explusalpha.com for more info, ports for other platforms, and my other apps.
